intro: Allosorus gracillimus, commonly known as the slender groundsel, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Allosorus gracillimus is often found in open woodlands and grasslands, where it thrives in well-drained soils.
